Infectum.turoyo: maḥtíwayna ʕoqǝlyoṯe daḥ=ḥmore w kefe w medone mʕalqíwayna appe d-mәmxәn (for them to be stretched) d-mәmxәn hŭl d-nәšfi әmmíwayna-watre.
translations: we hanged up (these things) on them (the former intestines) for them to be stretched, for them to be stretched till they get dry, we call them watre. 006_NE_GALA;17
